document.full_text: japanese new vehicle sales in april halved, sinking to the lowest monthly tally on record, as domestic automakers felt the full brunt of the march 11 earthquake that caused unprecedented disruption to car production.
document.title: quake sinks japan april car sales to record low
lines_and_colors: japanese new vehicle sales in april halved, sinking to the lowest monthly tally on record, as domestic automakers felt the full brunt of the march 11 earthquake that caused unprecedented disruption to car production.
